Pops came over to use my equipment to set up some lessons for his classes tomorrow.
Has to go to the doctor, didn't just want to leave his kids with a sub to watch a Modern Marvels episode or whatever.

He's actually been out of school on doctor's orders for a month already due to stress. Watching useless videos is all his kids have been doing for most of that time.
Monday was his first day he was allowed back.
The district fucked him over with his shop. They wanted to give him a new shop over the summer, but it's been absolutely plagued with problems.
No good deed?
Completely foreseeable problems that he was warning them about since day one, but they ignored him and now it's a complete fucking mess.
Like, putting in a 5 foot brick wall in the middle of the shop. Why? Who the fuck knows, not the building planner especially.
And the roof leaks like a sieve.
Oh, and it's a weld shop right? It'd be nice to have some welders in there right? Nope. No welders two months into classes still.

Pops has been stressed to high fuck about all of this it made him physically ill. Dude lost 40 pounds freaking out trying to get through to the admin at the city how they've made it impossible for him to teach.
a 5 foot brick wall? Was it...supporting...something?
Nope, just a wall. For no reason. Right in the middle of the shop.
He was there when the contractors had just put it in and asked them why they put it in. "I dunno what it's for. It was in the blueprints we got..."
That's...so weird.
It's incompetency on a whole 'nother level.
He's decided this is his last year because of it. Retiring just a few years early.
